title: OS Security
longDescription: Your operating system is the foundation of your digital security. Keep it secure with these essential practices.

items.title: Keep OS updated
items.details: Enable automatic updates for your operating system to ensure you have the latest security patches.

items.title: Disk encryption
items.details: Enable FileVault (Mac), BitLocker (Windows), or LUKS (Linux) to encrypt your entire drive in case your device is lost or stolen.

items.title: Secure boot
items.details: Secure boot helps prevent unauthorized boot loaders and software from loading during the startup process.
